        defaultAttack: - predators' attack point
        visionRadius: - predators' vision radius (tiles)
        huntingMethod: - predators' hunting strategy
        defaultColor: - predators' color for visualization

      • getTargetPrey

        private Prey getTargetPrey()
        Returns:
        A target prey in predator vision according to its hunting method. Null is return if no preys is found.
